rows.label: qev031501_MSG0001
rows.name:
No... This is just like legend.
Soon disaster will claim us all![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0002
rows.name: Is it true mighty giant fell to earth in Sylvalum?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev031501_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you downed the Zu Pharg there.

rows.label: qev031501_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev031501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask if he is talking about the Zu Pharg.

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0003
rows.name:
You were one to bring it down? Impressive.
But this hails greater danger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0004
rows.name:
Legends do not speak giant's name.
But you say Zu Pharg was large. So it must be true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0005
rows.name: On our planet, we had old legend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0006
rows.name:
"When giant falls to earth, world will die and find
life anew."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0007
rows.name:
Prone speak these words for 10,000 suns.
Pass them down through generations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0008
rows.name: Though few of Tree Clan or Cavern Clan remember.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0009
rows.name: If legend is true, this world will die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_JNK0030
rows.name: Believe

rows.label: qev031501_SEL0031
rows.name: Accept the legend as truth and start panicking.

rows.label: qev031501_JNK0040
rows.name: Doubt

rows.label: qev031501_SEL0041
rows.name: Claim that there's no factual basis for the legend.

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0010
rows.name: You respect ancient ways. Unusual for Earth alien.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0011
rows.name:
Regardless, we must ready for disaster.
I have sent warrior Oche to look for signs of change.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0012
rows.name:
You think ancient words are fake?
Typical Earth alien.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0013
rows.name: I hope you are right. I hope nothing comes to pass.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0014
rows.name:
But hope is not belief. So I have sent warrior Oche
to look for signs of change.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0015
rows.name: Nimu! Massive flood of beasts approaches![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0016
rows.name: Is this end you foretold?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0017
rows.name: Ah! Disaster comes at hands of sacred beasts![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0018
rows.name:
I have gathered clan's warriors. But we are few.
What can we do, Nimu?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0019
rows.name:
Hmm... Legend says single youth will rise.
Stand as ray of hope in darkness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0020
rows.name: Perhaps you are that hope, Earth alien![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0021
rows.name:
We can only pray it is so.
Now save our world from coming terror![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0022
rows.name:
Your bravery befits hero of legend.
Now hurry to field of battle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0023
rows.name: Ha ha! You cook up amusing tale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0024
rows.name: Cavern Clan! Why do you come here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0025
rows.name:
Do not bare your fangs, Tree Clan.
I have not come to fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0026
rows.name:
Many times has Cavern Clan said this.
Many times has Cavern Clan lied![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0027
rows.name: Now, go. Before I lose my temper.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0028
rows.name:
I came to offer aid. I should have known better.
Stubborn Tree fools![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0029
rows.name:
Enough. I will look after myself.
You can feed beasts for all I care![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0030
rows.name:
We need no aid from Cavern Clan.
Tree Clan protects our own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0031
rows.name:
Go to plains outside east gate.
We meet coming beasts there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0032
rows.name:
I should return your spite hundredfold.
And yet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0033
rows.name:
Bah! World is ending around us, Tree Clan fool!
Is this really time for petty squabbles?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0034
rows.name:
If you seek quarrel, let us fight when battle is over.
For now, shut up and join me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0035
rows.name: Hmph! Why should we help you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0036
rows.name: ...Hmm. Cavern clanswoman does not appear to lie.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0037
rows.name:
We must let go of grudges, Oche. 
Together we may ward off disaster.
Go now. Fight at this woman's side![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0038
rows.name: But, Nimu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0039
rows.name:
Heh. Old man has some sense, at least.
Now, to battle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0040
rows.name: Are you ready too, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0041
rows.name:
Fight with all your strength!
Fight, or get my boot in back of head![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_JNK0050
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev031501_SEL0051
rows.name: Flex and claim that you're ready to depart whenever.

rows.label: qev031501_JNK0060
rows.name: Retort

rows.label: qev031501_SEL0061
rows.name: Say you'll do even worse to Slovity if she slacks off.

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0042
rows.name: Heh. I forgot you are like me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0043
rows.name: Ha ha! Such talk! I like [ST:gender p1=boy p2=girl ] with fire.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0044
rows.name: We face them on East Gate Plain![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0045
rows.name:
Ah ha ha! This is my first big scrap in long time.
Now all will learn why Slovity is called "beastsbane"![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0046
rows.name:
They will fall to mighty Wolfen first!
We will show them power of Prone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0047
rows.name:
You must be ray of hope spoken of in legend.
Please save world from destruction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0048
rows.name:
You show bravery befitting hero of legend.
Now hurry to field of battle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0049
rows.name: Ha ha! You cook up amusing tale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0050
rows.name: Cavern Clan! Why do you come here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0051
rows.name:
Do not bare your fangs, Tree Clan.
I have not come to fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0052
rows.name:
Many times has Cavern Clan said this.
Many times has Cavern Clan lied![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0053
rows.name: Now go before I lose my temper.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0072
rows.name:
She may speak truth. But Cavern Clan is enemy.
They cannot be trusted, even in such times.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0073
rows.name:
Go to East Gate Plain, hero of old.
Turn back coming darkness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0077
rows.name:
You return! But what of battle?
Did you ward off disaster?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_JNK0090
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev031501_SEL0091
rows.name: Report that you managed to stop the threat.

rows.label: qev031501_JNK0100
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev031501_SEL0101
rows.name: Ask Nimu where Oche is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0078
rows.name: Good. Then Oche can rest in peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0079
rows.name:
He fell in battle. But dying as food for beasts is
glorious end for Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0080
rows.name:
He fell in battle. But dying as food for beasts is
glorious end for Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0081
rows.name:
And you were victorious? ...Good.
Now Oche can rest with no regrets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0082
rows.name:
"When giant falls to earth, world will die and find
life anew."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0083
rows.name:
I am clan's lore-keeper.
Yet even I do not know what new life is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0084
rows.name:
But world has avoided destruction. This is good.
Please take this in thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0085
rows.name:
It was close battle. Many lives were lost.
If we accepted Slovity's help, it might not be so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0086
rows.name:
What would you have done, Earth alien?
Could you forget 10,000 suns of bad blood?
Could you join with enemy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_JNK0110
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev031501_SEL0111
rows.name: Say that you would have worked together.

rows.label: qev031501_JNK0120
rows.name: Shake Head

rows.label: qev031501_SEL0121
rows.name: Say that you would have also refused them.

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0087
rows.name: A fair view. Maybe we should share it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0088
rows.name:
Trouble will rise again someday.
Future generations must learn from our mistakes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0089
rows.name: Such long hatreds are hard to cast aside.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0090
rows.name:
But that hatred cost Oche his life. Hmmm...
It is difficult problem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0074
rows.name: Slovity is Cavern Clan. Yet still interesting Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0075
rows.name:
I thought them all senseless. Lawless fools.
Perhaps some are not so bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0076
rows.name:
Go to East Gate Plain, hero of old!
Unite warriors! Turn back coming darkness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0091
rows.name: They told me all. It was great victory![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0092
rows.name:
Greatest! Though I felled 20 more beasts than
Cavern woman.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0093
rows.name: I left weakest for you. Others would have killed you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0094
rows.name:
So face cinicula and win like me before you brag!
Only coward fights weaker prey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0095
rows.name:
I admit you fought with...bravery. Strength.
But I was still victor![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0096
rows.name:
Warriors are so stubborn. Who was stronger,
Earth alien? Cavern Clan or Tree Clan?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_JNK0130
rows.name: Say "Tree"

rows.label: qev031501_SEL0131
rows.name: Answer that the Tree Clan was stronger.

rows.label: qev031501_JNK0140
rows.name: Say "Cavern"

rows.label: qev031501_SEL0141
rows.name: Answer that the Cavern Clan was stronger.

rows.label: qev031501_JNK0150
rows.name: Say "Both"

rows.label: qev031501_SEL0151
rows.name: Answer that both were equally strong.

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0097
rows.name: WHAT?! Ugh. Hearing that from you is...terrible blow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0098
rows.name:
Hmph. Just wait for next battle.
I will slay many more than you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0099
rows.name: And I will train to stay ahead of you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0100
rows.name: It is true. I lack her skill...for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0101
rows.name:
But I will be 10 times stronger by next battle.
I will defeat beast you dare not even face![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0102
rows.name:
I look forward to it. You now waste much effort in
your fighting style. Hone your skill. Grow strong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0103
rows.name:
You are right. After 10,000 suns of fighting,
we forget we are all children of Tormein.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0104
rows.name:
If only our clans could join together.
We would be warriors fit to rival Wrothians![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0105
rows.name:
"When giant falls to earth, world will die and find
life anew."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0106
rows.name: Maybe this bond is new life of legend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0107
rows.name:
Tree and Cavern Clans fear nothing if we stand as one.
...And if you stand with us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031501_MSG0108
rows.name: Please take this gift. Then raise toast to new future![ST:wait ]
